alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 23 at 7:28PM MST until August 23 at 9:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 728 PM MST, Emergency management reported flash flooding at Willis Ranch and Stockton Hill Road from heavy rain that fell prior to 7 PM MST. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Stockton Hill Road and Willis Ranch FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
